title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions:
1. Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water until al dente. 
2. While the pasta is cooking, heat the olive oil in a pan and fry the pancetta until crisp. Add the garlic and cook for another minute. 
3. In a bowl, whisk the eggs and Parmesan together. 
4. Drain the pasta, reserving some of the pasta water. 
5. Add the pasta to the pan with pancetta and garlic. Turn off the heat. 
6. Quickly pour in the egg and cheese mixture, stirring quickly to create a creamy sauce. Add pasta water if needed to loosen the sauce. 
7. Season with salt and black pepper to taste. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions:
1. Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces and marinate with yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and paprika for at least 1 hour. 
2. Heat the oil in a large pan and sauté the onions until soft. 
3. Add the marinated chicken to the pan and cook until it’s browned on all sides. 
4. Add the crushed tomatoes, reduce heat, and simmer for 20 minutes. 
5. Stir in the cream and cook for another 5 minutes. 
6. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.
